mapper.select: select * from( SELECT UserID, ADATE, userin, userout, ATEXCEPTION, CASE WHEN (USERIN=-1 or USEROUT=-1) THEN '결석' WHEN USERIN>(SELECT starttime FROM( SELECT * FROM member m join EDUCLASS e on m.EDUCLASS = e.NUM )where userid=#{userid}) AND USEROUT<(SELECT endtime FROM( SELECT * FROM member m join EDUCLASS e on m.EDUCLASS = e.NUM )where userid=#{userid}) THEN '결석' WHEN USERIN>(SELECT starttime FROM( SELECT * FROM member m join EDUCLASS e on m.EDUCLASS = e.NUM )where userid=#{userid}) THEN '지각' WHEN USEROUT<(SELECT endtime FROM( SELECT * FROM member m join EDUCLASS e on m.EDUCLASS = e.NUM )where userid=#{userid}) THEN '조퇴' else '출석' end AS STATUE FROM BEPRESENT ORDER BY ADATE DESC )where userid=#{userid}
